contact.title: How can I help?
contact.subtitle: Would you like to hire me for a freelance job or do you have any questions? Feel free to contact me by filling out the form below, and I will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.authorizeCheckbox: I authorize this website to store my submitted information so that they can respond to my query.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.subtitle: Below, you'll find all my detailed professional experiences, highlighting the technologies I've used throughout my career. If you prefer, you can download my resume

contentCreation.title: Content creation
contentCreation.livesTimeSubtitle:
every Wednesday starting at 7 PM and Saturdays starting at 2 PM, creating programming content covering various technologies, from beginner to advanced levels. 

During the livestreams, I interact with viewers, aiming to answer all messages sent, both during the livestream and in the videos on
contentCreation.youtubeVideosSubtitle: , you can find highlights from my livestreams organized into playlists for easier continuity and searching for specific content.

aboutMe.introduction:
Hello! My name is Lucas, I'm myAgeReplace years old, and I've been working in programming for over ageReplace years.

I'm completely passionate about what I do. Since 2016, when I started in this field, I've never regretted beginning this journey of continuous learning.

I'm a full-stack developer, but my favorite part is C# with .NET Core.
aboutMe.hobbies:
Outside of work, I have several hobbies, such as tabletop games and computer games, playing the guitar, programming (yes, livestreams are like hobbies to me), etc.

I'm a pet parent, I like tattoos; in fact, the ones I have are related to my favorite movies/books, Lord of the Rings. I enjoy painting RPG miniatures; it's a hobby that teaches me a lot about patience, trial and error, and not giving up before seeing the final result.
aboutMe.hardSkills: C#, .NET Core, Node.JS, React, Next.JS, Angular, Vue.JS, Flutter, ASP.NET Core Razor, Ionic, Hangfire, RabbitMQ, Kafka, PubNub, AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, MySQL, SQL Server, Postgres, MongoDB, CosmosDB
aboutMe.softSkills: Communication, Teamwork, Resilience, Empathy, Organization, Flexibility, Creativity
